snippet: The Kansas Supreme Court ruled on Thursday that the state's system of funding primary and secondary public schools falls short of an adequacy requirement in the state constitution....

headline.main: 2 Charged With Trying to Bring Loaded Guns Onto Planes
headline.print_headline: 2 Charged With Trying to Bring Loaded Guns Onto Planes

lead_paragraph: The Kansas Supreme Court ruled on Thursday that the state's system of funding primary and secondary public schools falls short of an adequacy requirement in the state constitution.
